txt.en: 'You have intruded upon my territory, mortal, and earned my wrath.'
'The realm of spirits is not for your kind.'
You have defeated the boar-spirit
'And so I shall crush you into the loam of the forest, where your bones shall feed the roots!'
The Boar Spirit yields!
'Enough! Your strength is proven, and I yield!'
'To think that I might be bested so. Perhaps this age does indeed draw to a close. Farewell, [placeholder].'
Lavaneth has bidden you challenge an ancient spirit of strength in the Wild Hunt that the Huntsman has set before you.
'Go now little one. You have proven yourself, but this is not your place. The waking world awaits you.'
Approach the ancient spirit and prove your strength in challenge against it.
As you lean down and drink from the pool, strange visions dance before your eyes, and the odd mist that had fallen upon the forest begins to lift.
After speaking with the Boar-spirit, you must drink from the strange pool to escape from this eerie realm of spirits.
Drink from the strange pool to escape from this eerie realm of spirits.
The boar glowers at you, temperamentally pawing at the ground as you approach. Its white tusks are long and deadly, glimmering in the starlight.
The boar glowers at you, tempermentally pawing at the ground as you approach.\n\nIts white tusks are long and deadly, glimmering in the starlight.
Challenge the boar-spirit
Defeat the boar-spirit
Speak with the Boar-spirit
Drink from the Strange Pool
Instance: The Wild Hunt -- Lavaneth's Spirit
